text:
Memenuhi keinginan anak untuk melihat candi Borobudur dan Keraton kami liburan ke Yogyakarta.

Berangkat dari Gambir tanggal 26 Juni 2022 jam 21.30 menumpang kereta Taksaka dan tiba di Yogyakarta tanggal 27 Juni 2022 pukul 04.00 pagi dijemput sopir travel yang sudah kami booking.

Menunggu jam check in di hotel KHAS MALIOBORO yang sudah kami booking untuk tanggal 27 sd 30 Juni 2022, dimana prediksi kami adalah jam 12.00 siang maka kami keliling2 kota Yogya sambil mengunjungi beberapa toko batik dan kuliner.

Jam 12.30 kami tiba di Hotel Khas Malioboro dan langsung ke lobby yang dipenuhi tamu hotel yang mau Check In juga. Tiba giliran kami, ternyata kami baru bisa Check In jam 14.00 dengan alasan kamar masih dibersihkan. Lalu kami dianjurkan menunggu di resto. Beberapa menit kemudian kami pindah ke sofa di lobby yang sudah kosong. 

Lama menunggu dan mungkin karena kelelahan saya ketiduran di sofa. Tak terasa tidur berapa lama tiba2 saya terbangun karena mendengar suara istri saya marah2 dan berdebat dengan staf reseosionis. Kulihat jam sudah jam 13.55. Perdebatannya sengit, akhirnya staf itu diganti leader-nya menangani masalah kami yang belum bisa2 Check In padahal sudah hampir jam 14.00.

Dalam lift menuju kamar di lantai 9, istri saya menceritakan bahwa kedua staf resepsionis itu ketawa ketiwi dan cekikikan mendengar saya yang tertidur "mendengkur" di sofa yang lebih dekat ke arah lift. Mereka tidak sadar istri saya yang duduk di sofa yang persis didepan counter resepsionis memperhatikan tingkah laku mereka. Jadi, istri saya tersinggung dan berfikir bukannya berempati menolong mempercepat proses Check In malah mentertawakqn tamunya. Karena selama menunggu itu katanya sudah 4 kali istri saya bolak balik minta tolong agar Check In bisa lebih cepat.

Untuk staf yang mentertawai saya, Just to say Fuck You.
title: Staf Resepsionis Yang Tidak Punya Empati.

Terimakasih sudah memilih KHAS Malioboro Hotel dan berbagi review mengenai hotel kami. Kami sangat menyesal membaca review dari Bapak mengenai beberapa hal yang masih kurang dari pelayanan kami. Musim liburan saat ini juga menjadikan hotel-hotel di Jogja sangat rame sehingga membutuhkan perhatian yang ekstra. 

Kami mohon maaf atas beberapa hal yang mengurangi  kenyamanan Bapak sekeluarga selama berada di hotel kami dan kami berharap bisa menyambut Bapak sekeluarga kembali di KHAS Malioboro, tentunya dengan pelayanan prima seperti yang Bapak harapkan.

text:
Menginap di sini dengan istri dan anak dewasa di connecting room selama 2 malam cukup menyenangkan, walaupun bukannya tidak ada kekurangan. Cat plafon dan dinding kamar sudah mulai mengelupas, lampu kamar mandi kamar anak saya  kurang terang, alat pencetan sabun cair otomatis tidak berfungsi, dan washtafel di kamar saya agak buntu. Respons staf utk komplain perbaikan washtafel cukup cepat, walaupun washtafel setelah perbaikan kondisinya tidak banyak berubah. Komplain lampu kamar mandi juga cepat, langsung diganti dengan yg lebih terang. Mohon diperhatikan masalah (maaf) bau badan staf yg memperbaiki washtafel, cukup menggangu.

Kritik yg lain adalah mengenai breakfast, saya rasa bisa lebih ditingkatkan lagi masalah rasa. Kemarin bubur ayam yg dihidangkan buburnya dingin, sudah minta dipanaskan dan tetap dingin. Mie gorengnya kurang fresh, seperti sudah lama dimasak (maaf kalau salah). Untuk variasi makanan dan minuman cukup memadai.

Poin plus hotel ini adalah jarak yg dekat dengan Malioboro sisi selatan (Pasar Beringharjo), sehingga dengan jalan kaki pun kurang dari 10 menit sudah sampai. Kalau malas jalan kaki, ada bentor yg selalu standby di depan gerbang hotel.

Fasilitas di kamar dan kamar mandi cukup baik, ada coffee maker, mineral water, brankas, kulkas, handuk, sikat gigi, pasta gigi, sabun dan shampoo. AC nya dingin, air hangat di kamar mandi sangat memadai, saya suka shower mandinya model menghadap ke bawah.

Tempat parkir cukup memadai, baik utk mobil, motor, sepertinya 1-2 bus besar juga bisa masuk.

Protokol kesehatan Covid-19 telah dilaksanakan dengan baik.

Demikian ulasan saya, semoga bermanfaat. Sukses selalu untuk Pesonna Hotel Malioboro.
title: Cukup Menyenangkan

text:
Tempatnya enak dan nyaman. 
Suasananya juga tenang.
Lokasi sangat strategis dekat dengan Malioboro, dengan berjalan kaki hanya 500 meter dari hotel.
Dekat dengan minimarket seperti Alfamart dan Indomaret. 
Staffnya sangat ramah sekali. 

Menjalankan sistem protokol kesehatannya dengan baik sesuai dengan anjuran pemerintah.

Menu untuk breakfast standar walaupun tidak ada variasi makanannya.

Untuk kekurangannya:

AC kamar tidak dingin. Untuk dingin harus menunggu lebih lama. Kebetulan saya reserve untuk 2 kamar.
Dua duanya AC kamar tidak dingin. Kamar yang di pakai anak anak saya AC nya bocor seperti air terjun.
Lantai kamar mandinya licin dan masih ada lumutnya.
Kamar mandinya sangat kotor kurang bersih.

Sedangkan untuk breakfast rotinya sangat keras tidak bisa di makan. Itu juga saya bakar rotinya supaya tidak terlalu keras, kalau bakarnya terlalu kering mungkin tambah tidak enak dan tidak bisa di makan lagi. 
Di resto staffnya kurang cepat dalam mengisi ulang sajian jadi customer harus menunggu lebih lama untuk mengambil makanannya. 
Contohnya: buah waktu saya mau ambil ternyata kosong.

Sarannya: 
Untuk kamar setelah di semprot disinfektan sebaiknya di segel sehingga customer lebih yakin kalau sudah di semprot disinfektan.
title: Lokasi Strategis

text: Jarang-jarang ada hotel yang menyediakan peralatan ibadah secara lengkap di dalam kamar. Hotel Pesonna justru menyediakan semuanya di seluruh kamarnya. Sejak naik lift, melewati lorong, hingga masuk kamar, suasana terasa tenang dan tidak berisik. Paling suka dengan menu sarapannya, banyak pilihan menu yang enak-enak dan nggak bikin bosan. Dekat dengan banyak objek wisata terkenal Jogja, terutama kawasan wisata belanja Malioboro. Pelayanan prima, para staff pun sangat ramah. Bakal balik ke hotel ini kalau liburan lagi ke Yogyakarta.

text:
Dari tanggal 18-22 Juli 2018, klien yang saya bawa menginap di Pesonna Malioboro Hotel. Klien saya adalah Buddhist Group dari Malaysia, Nalanda Buddhist Society pimpinan Dr. Tan Hoo Soon. 
Sedangkan perwakilan agent dari Malaysia adalah Mr. Voon Siong dan ini merupakan pertama kalinya menginap di Pesonna.

text:
Pas lihat gedung hotel drI luar sedikit mirip Istana Kepresidenan. Hotel nya sendiri didirikan baru sekitar 9 bulan menurut salah satu Staff yg mengantarkan barang bawaan saya.

1. Proses cek in tidak lama dan berbelit, dan terima kasih untuk Management Pesona Hotel Malioboro yg sudah meng-upgrade kamar saya juga. Really appreciate it.

2. Kamar bersih dan lumayan luas, cuman hanya saja kurang perawatan untuk setiap sudut dinding, apalagi dinding kamar mandi.

3. Staff dan pelayanan nya ramah dan bagus, juga fasilitas hotelnya.

4. Hanya saja suara bising dari kamar sebelah jelas sekali terdengar. Orang yg sedang mandi sekali pun terdengar jelas ke kamar saya.

text:
My family’s entourage from Malaysia came to Jogja for a 4 days stay at Pesonna hotel from 22-25th February 2020. The hotel situated very near to the famous shopping district - just 5min walk or RP.20,000 beca ride to the Malioboro street. 

The staff are very friendly, and very helpful. I have to highlight one staff, Mr.Ervin, who’s always very warm and attentive to the guests including towards my family.

The hotel is very clean, the only downside of it was the room size, Which is rather small. Its suitable for single traveller or a couple to stay, but a bit compact for a family with small kids.

The food selection is limited but well prepared & delicious. The price for food & room are very reasonable too. 

I highly recommend this hotel for a goos stay in Jogja. 

Best Regards & thank you, 

Ms. Nadya Shahabuddin
Kuala Lumpur
title: Great location & amazing hospitality at Pesonna Hotel Malioboro.

text:
The location is just perfect, close to the main attractions and Malioboro. There is bus stop Malioboro 3 near the hotel. We took bus 1A from and to the airport (3500 IDR, 30-45 min). We could also go to Prambanan and Borobudur by public transport and walked to the other sights.
Internet was good and breakfast was also ok. However, the hotel is popular with local  tourist groups. They arrive in big buses and breakfast is not so enjoyable with them together, because then there's no place to sit and the staff is not refilling the buffet fast enough. Not so pleasant experience. They have good coffee from a machine but you need to ask for it. 
Staff is nice, but service level is inconsistent. Sometimes they open the door for you, sometimes not, even though there are three (!) staff people standing right next to it. Two days we had "turn down service" with additional cleaning,  two days not. One day we had great service during breakfast, but that was declining throughout the following three days. Guess they were too tired dealing with the tour groups.
The room was not as nice as in the pictures, especially the bathroom looked a bit dated. The drains were not working well, so you had to be careful not to flood the bathroom while showering.
Cleanliness was good.
Be prepared to wake up early, since the military compound next to the hotel starts practising marching and dancing (with loud reggae music) around 7 am.
Overall we enjoyed our stay, the hotel is good. Could even become great some time by improving the bathroom facilities and maintaining a consistently high level of service.
P.s. They don't serve alcohol. There is a really good chinese restaurant nearby, where you can have a beer with your food.
title: Best Location

text:
Our travel agent Lovely Borobudor Tours  booked the Pesonna Hotel Malioboro for our stay from 6 – 9 February 2019. Check in was a breeze into connecting rooms 511/515.  The rooms are simple, cosy and comfortably set up with all basic amenities.  Only pillows are abit soft to our liking but well maybe we should request for harder ones on our next visit.

Hotel has fast speed wireless connection . Breakfast in Coffee house has local buffet spread.  It is located within few minutes walk to the busy Malioboro Street where it is a shopping and food haven!!!  

After a full day walkabout at the tour site, it is great to come back to a place when we feel like home especially surrounded by friendly , courteous and helpful Staff.

Keep it up , indeed a great hotel to stay if you ever visit Yogyakarta!!
title: A great hotel to stay !!

text: The hotel is located in strategic area, near to Malioboro Street. The room is big enough and there is extra space for praying, the price is also quite good. But I really had a bad first impression during the check in. I came at 1.20 pm to receptionist, I gave them the ID card and they inform us the room number but I have to wait until 2 pm since I came too early. I did not mind waiting for 40!minutes but since the lobby is too small and they do not have enough chairs in lobby, I have to wait in restaurant. At 2.05 pm I came again to lobby and I was pretty confident that the room is ready, but turns out the receptionist asking me about my room number and call the housekeeping by phone and the housekeeping answered that the room is still not ready! Unbelievable! They know that we’re already there since 1.40 but they did not inform the housekeeping to finish clean our room before 2 pm?? So I have to wait again for 30 minutes until my room was ready, and the receptionists did not even say sorry. I hope they can improve their service to the guests and have a better housekeeping management.
title: Good Location but Poor Check In System

text: The hotel is very modern - the lobby, dining room, bedroom & bathroom. Bed was comfortable, AC worked great, Wifi great in room AND in lobby, Cable TV, mini fridge, 2 free bottles water per day. Breakfast buffet has a lot of good food. Staff VERY friendly and helped with all my many questions. They even surprised me with cake and singing happy birthday while I was at the breakfast, and I never even told them it was my birthday. They figured it out when I checked in and showed passport. It was a great surprise! About 5-10 minute walk to the lively Malioboro Street. They even provided transportation to both Borobudur and Prambanan temples for a good rate. I heard there was a mosque that had the call to prayer at 4am, so I requested a room facing the other way. I didn't hear the 4am prayer, but heard one in the early evening. But someone staying at another hotel elsewhere told me they heard a 4am call to prayer, so sounds like it's a common issue. But wasn't bad for me at this hotel. Overall, a great 3 night experience for this solo traveler.
title: Friendly Staff, Modern, Good Location

text:
We stayed here 4 nights towards the end of July. Nothing really but praise for this hotel. 

Excellent location within walking distance of train station, Malioboro Street, Kraton, Taman Sari etc. Lots of cheap eats nearby. 

Staff are excellent, courteous and helpful. Breakfast is fantastic with a wide range of Indonesian good and some more western choices. 

Rooms are spacious and clean.  Bed was comfortable.  Hot water wasn't always really hot but on a hot Yogyakarta day who cares. 

Good value for the price.  Definitely stay at Pesonna again even though it doesn't have a fitness room which I almost always require of a hotel room in Asia.
title: Great hotel

text:
Located near Malioboro and Keraton on a side street. Billed as 3 star. Modern with small reception at entrance and restaurant on the left hand side. 

The Superior Room which I occupied was average size for 3 star business hotel. The room has its own air conditioning unit and is not a centralized unit. It was stuffy and hot until the airconditioner cooled down the room. Lighting was insufficient and the room is too dim for my liking. There is no storage space for clothes only hangars. Bathroom is with shower and has what’s required, nothing more. Wifi is free and pretty fast which was useful.

I had dinner and breakfast at the Resturant. Both are buffet style with no apparent a la carte. Small buffet distinguished by poor quality food. There is better food outside the hotel. 

Fortunately I was there only for a night as I would not be comfortable staying longer.
title: Modern and utilitarian business hotel to stay if you had no alternatives....

text: The hotel is bright and clean and spacious.  The staff are all so genuinely friendly and helpful.  English is well understood and spoken by those who are in contact with guests, at reception, in the breakfast room.  Although the room was a little small, with only a little space to leave one's clothes, it was well appointed, and the bed was comfortable.  I don't know how a second person would fit with luggage.   They had left a plate of fruit in my room.  The a/c, tv, wifi, shower all worked exactly as they should.  I  was there for 6 nights touring the area.  The food in the breakfast hall was delicious, with staff willing to explain what each tray held.  Mostly though I was really pleased with the staff.  They all greeted me by name, and knew my room number.  They helped my with my airline departure.  All in all, a great hotel.  I am surprised that not more Westerners were staying there.  Its location is also very good.  Just a brief stroll to bustling Marlioboro street.  I would definitely  recommend it to everyone and would insist on staying there should I return.  For those who need a beer, note this service is not available.  Have a pot of tea instead.
title: Marvelous stay

I look forward to book my holidays again at the Hotel Pesonna Malioboro, when i come back to Yogyakarta.Thank you Pesonna Staff to give me this nice stay at your hotel.

text:
Stayed here for 3 nights.
Here is what we really enjoyed from the hotel.

- first off all the location is terrific, 5 minutes by foot from Malioboro street, and walking distance from a lot of attractions in the centre of Yogya.

- the rooms were clean and spatious and the bed was very comfy.

- free water, tea and coffee.

- very friendly staff.

Here's what we didn't like in the hotel.

- the hotel is very noisy and the walls are very thin, 
When you're sleeping and other guests are loud in the hallway , you might be woken up.
There is an army station down the street and they've woken us up with their morning drill.

- When we arrived in our room one of our pillows was dirty. Luckily there where enough pillows in the room, but still this shouldn't be happening.

Overall I would recommend this place unless you've got a very light sleep.
title: Good location,but very loud!

text:
Ho soggiornato due volte in questo albergo. La prima volta è andata bene, la seconda non mi ha soddisfatta pienamente. Mi sono svegliata all'alba sia per gli altoparlanti della moschea che per l'inno nazionale a volume altissimo proveniente dalla casema vicino all'hotel (alle prime luci dell'alba). Alle 9.00 sono venuti a bussare per sapere se la stanza andava pulita.  In sostanza, quindi , la mattina non è possibile dormire quanto si desidera. La posizione dell'albergo è buona e la pulizia, che rispetto agli altri alberghi dove ho soggiornato in Malesia è migliore,  potrebbe essere migliorata soprattutto in bagno. Non forniscono sapone per le mani, ma deve utilizzarsi il doccia schiuma.
Se non si hanno aspettative particolari, per un breve soggiorno l'albergo sicuramente va bene.
title: Benino

text:
De kamer die we kregen zag er zeer schoon en netjes uit. Ook was deze zeer ruim.
Het hotel is goed centraal gelegen voor het bezoeken van de bezienswaardigheden,
de Kraton, fort Vredeburg en Malioborostreet is op loopafstand.
De voorzieningen in het hotel zijn uitstekend, is er iets niet aanwezig, je hoeft het maar te vragen en ze komen het brengen. Ook de wasservice is zeer goed. S' morgens afgeven en in de avond wordt het netjes op je kamer bezorgt

text: ジョグジャカルタから早朝のボロブドゥール&プランバナンチャーターツアーに参加するため1泊宿泊させていただきました。立地は4〜5分歩くとメイン通りに出ます。飲食店や雑貨店などもたくさんあります。ホテルも1泊じゃもったいないくらい、スタッフさんもフレンドリーで、うちのつたない英語でも理解しようとフォローもしてくださり、部屋に戻ればウェルカムスイーツも持って来てくれてホスピタリティにあふれています。浴室も部屋も綺麗に掃除されていて排水も問題ないです。ただ、浴室とトイレがガラス半分の仕切りしかないので、少し水跳ねがあるくらいですが、気になる量ではありません。また、ジョグジャカルタに宿泊した際はまた是非宿泊したいです！！
title: パーフェクト
